title: satyamunakidi
sahitya:
satyamunakidi kAdu manci kAlam nitya dur-varttanulakidi manci kAlam


caraNam 1    hari bhaktula hariyincu kAlam parama pApulakella varamaina kAlam 
pativratala nindinci bAdhincu kAlam patula bAdhincu satulaku manci kAlam
    caraNam 2    upakArulakella apakArikA kalakAlam udArulella bikArulau kAlam 
bandhu mitrulanella nammatagani kAlam muraLIdhara shrI 
purandara viThalA bahu citramainadI kali kAlamayyA
